original_text: “Why were you searching for me?” he asked. “Didn’t you know I had to be in my Father’s house?”
korean_text: 예수께서 이르시되 어찌하여 나를 찾으셨나이까 내가 내 아버지 집에 있어야 될 줄을 알지 못하셨나이까 하시니

sentences.original_text: Why were you searching for me?
I had to be in my Father's house?
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 내 아버지의 집에 있어야 함을
